settings.title: Contact Us
settings.content: Send us an email at support@wvnders.com and it will be a pleasure to help you!

settings.title: COMING TO A RETAIL LOCATION NEAR YOU!

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: Loyalty Program
settings.text: Subscribe to our email list to become a part of our loyalty program. You'll receive special discounts and advance notice on limited edition products!

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: HOW MUCH IS SHIPPING?
settings.subtitle: Standard shipping is $5.95 for domestic and $6.95 for international.

settings.title: WHY DIDN'T MY ORDER COME TOGETHER IN ONE PACKAGE?
settings.subtitle: We ship your orders from various international warehouses (US, Canada, China and Singapore). Our inventory is distributed over multiple fulfilment centers around the world  in order for you to receive the order faster. This means orders containing multiple items may be shipped individually. You may receive an item before the next. So don't panic if you don't receive all of your items at once as the others are on the way. If you do not receive all your purchase within 8 weeks, please contact us to look into your shipment.

settings.title: DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide.

settings.title: HOW LONG WILL MY ORDER TAKE TO BE DELIVERED?
settings.subtitle: Please allow 2-3 business days for processing your order. After which, your order will be ready to ship out. It usually takes only 7-14 business days for shipping to the US and 25-35 business days for international shipping, depending on your location. Please note that delivery time may be affected by holidays and peak season.

settings.title: HOW DO I TRACK MY PACKAGE?
settings.subtitle: We will send you a tracking number when your order ships. Simply visit the carrier's website and enter the tracking number to see the shipping status of your package.

settings.title: WHY CAN'T I TRACK MY ORDER ON THE WEBSITE
settings.subtitle: Please note that the tracking information will be displayed after 2-5 days after being updated.

settings.title: WHY IS MY SHIPMENT STATUS NOT UPDATING?
settings.subtitle: Your shipment may be delayed for many reasons. Common delays can be due to e.g. weather incidents, customs or backlogs.

settings.title: HELP! THERE'S A PROBLEM WITH MY SHIPMENT!
settings.subtitle: If there's an issue with your package, please contact our Support Team. Send us an email at support@wvnders.com. Please be sure to include your order and tracking numbers, a brief explanation of the problem, and any case or reference numbers you have started with the carrier.

settings.title: CUSTOMS CHARGES
settings.subtitle: The value and shipping information is printed on a sticker on the outside of the package when your order is shipped. We will mark the package as gift for our customers. BUT duties and taxes are calculated and charged by customs officials in your country. As such, they are beyond our control. As the importer of record, you are responsible for duties, taxes, and any other charges that your country chooses to impose for the import.

settings.title: HOW MUCH WILL CUSTOMS CHARGES BE FOR MY COUNTRY?
settings.subtitle: As charges are individually assessed by your country’s officials upon import, we are unable to provide an estimate on how much you may be charged for customs. Charges vary from cases to case. Instead, please try contacting the customs officials in your country to get a better idea of what the customs charges may be for your order.

settings.title: HOW CAN I PAY FOR MY ORDER?
settings.subtitle: Current payment methods for US orders are Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, JCB, Diners Club, and PayPal.

settings.title: WHAT CURRENCY IS DISPLAYED ON THE WEBSITE?
settings.subtitle: Our products are listed in US Dollar.

settings.title: HOW DO I ORDER?
settings.subtitle: Browse through the products that you love, then click "Add to cart" and "Check out". Enter your shipping and billing details and wait for your order to arrive at your doorstep. It is that easy :)

settings.title: OH NO! I NEED TO MODIFY MY ORDER!
settings.subtitle: Unfortunately, please note that we are only able to make changes to your order if it has not been fulfilled yet. If you want to change anything in your order, please contact us via email support@wvnders.com within 24 hours after placing your order. If the order has been shipped, we can no longer make modifications to your order.

settings.title: WHAT IS YOUR REFUND POLICY?
settings.subtitle: WVNDERS has a 30 day refund policy for all orders placed through WVNDERS.COM. If you are not satisfied with your order for any reason, simply contact us for return instructions and a refund. Please note we can only accept returns that are unopened and unused. Please also note that we do not accept refunds for discounted items unless product arrives broken. If that is the case, please contact us WITH your order number at support@wvnders.com

settings.title: WHAT IF I RECEIVED A DAMAGED PRODUCT?
settings.subtitle: We always try source for the best quality products for our customers. However, there are many factors that might have resulted your products to be damaged in the transit.

settings.title: Page FAQ Template
settings.subtitle: Create an amazing FAQ page with a full-width banner
